What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. played Gossamer Phantom
2. opponent casted Sheltering Word
3. notification reads: [...] gains life equal to -1's toughness [...] What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.48.890 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
